name: Sprout Blast
description:
Take down the mutant monster plants that threaten your simple livelihood on a desolate planet in the cosmos. Collect their seeds, plant and harvest them to gain their powers. How long will you survive? Controls:

Left Click -- Shoot

Right Click -- Plant / Collect Plants

WASD / Arrow Keys -- Move

Scroll Wheel -- Change selected seed in inventory

This game was made for the Cultivation Jam hosted by Team Dogpit
